name: headtail
description: ```node ./head.js file1   node ./head.js -n5 file1   node ./head.js -n 5 file1   node ./head.js -5 file1   node ./head.js file1 file2   node ./head.js -n 5 file1 file2   node ./head.js -n5 file1 file2   node ./head.js -5 file1 file2    node ./head.js -c5 file1   node ./head.js -c 5 file1   node ./head.js -c5 file1 file2   node ./head.js -c 5 file1 file2   ```
